activities: We do not store or bring any data/information in-house. We are anticipating to work on a project for a client from the EU region and hence want to make sure that we are Safe Harbor compliant. We are going to perform data modelling and analytics for them - using their servers.
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, United Kingdom
recoursemech: If you have any data privacy inquiries, please e-mail us at info (at) frescodata dot com or call us at 888.902.5106.  If we are unable to satisfactorily address your concerns, you may contact the DMA which serves as the third party for Safe Harbor-related dispute resolution.
